api.name: ObMultiTranslateLoader
api.usage: A utility function that returns a TranslateModuleConfig with multiple files support.

inputs.name: config
inputs.text: Additional optional config options for the TranslateModule

tokens.name: TRANSLATION_FILES
tokens.text: An array with the translation files to load.

api.name: getTranslateLoader
api.usage: A factory that returns a MultiTranslateHttpLoader instance. It should only be directly used if ObMultiTranslateLoader could not be used.

api.name: MultiTranslateHttpLoader
api.usage: An handler to load multiple translation files. It should only be directly used if neither ObMultiTranslateLoader nor getTranslateLoader could be used.

api.name: ObITranslationFile
api.usage: This interface represent the location of translation resource file

properties.name: prefix
properties.text: Prefix of the translation resource file

properties.name: suffix
properties.text: Suffix of the translation resource file
